verses.verse: Woe<WH1945> to them that are at ease<WH7600> in Zion,<WH6726> and trust<WH982> in the mountain<WH2022> of Samaria,<WH8111> which are named<WH5344> chief<WH7225> of the nations,<WH1471> to whom<WH1992> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> came!<WH935>

Pass<WH5674> you to Calneh,<WH3641> and see;<WH7200> and from there<WH8033> go<WH3212> you to Hamath<WH2579> the great:<WH7227> then go<WH3381> down<WH3381> to Gath<WH1661> of the Philistines:<WH6430> be they better<WH2896> than<WH4480> these<WH428> kingdoms?<WH4467> or their border<WH1366> greater<WH7227> than your border?<WH1366>
You that put far away<WH5077> the evil<WH7451> day,<WH3117> and cause the seat<WH7675> of violence<WH2555> to come<WH5066> near;<WH5066>

That lie<WH7901> on beds<WH4296> of ivory,<WH8127> and stretch<WH5628> themselves on their couches,<WH6210> and eat<WH398> the lambs<WH3733> out of the flock,<WH6629> and the calves<WH5695> out of the middle<WH8432> of the stall;<WH4770>
That chant<WH6527> to the sound<WH6310> of the viol,<WH5035> and invent<WH2803> to themselves<WH1992> instruments<WH3627> of music,<WH7892> like David;<WH1732>

That drink<WH8354> wine<WH3196> in bowls,<WH4219> and anoint<WH4886> themselves with the chief<WH7225> ointments:<WH8081> but they are not grieved<WH2470> for the affliction<WH7667> of Joseph.<WH3130>
Therefore<WH3651> now<WH6258> shall they go captive<WH1540> with the first<WH7218> that go captive,<WH1540> and the banquet<WH4797> of them that stretched<WH5628> themselves shall be removed.<WH5493>

The Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> has sworn<WH7650> by himself,<WH5315> said<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> the God<WH430> of hosts,<WH6635> I abhor<WH8374> the excellency<WH1347> of Jacob,<WH3290> and hate<WH8130> his palaces:<WH759> therefore will I deliver<WH5462> up the city<WH5892> with all<WH4393> that is therein.<WH4393>
And it shall come<WH1961> to pass, if<WH518> there remain<WH3498> ten<WH6235> men<WH582> in one<WH259> house,<WH1004> that they shall die.<WH4191>

And a man's uncle<WH1730> shall take<WH5375> him up, and he that burns<WH5635> him, to bring<WH3318> out the bones<WH6106> out of the house,<WH1004> and shall say<WH559> to him that is by the sides<WH3411> of the house,<WH1004> Is there yet any with you? and he shall say,<WH559> No.<WH657> Then shall he say,<WH559> Hold<WH2013> your tongue:<WH2013> for we may not make mention<WH2142> of the name<WH8034> of the LORD.<WH3068>
For, behold,<WH2009> the LORD<WH3068> commands,<WH6680> and he will smite<WH5221> the great<WH1419> house<WH1004> with breaches,<WH7447> and the little<WH6996> house<WH1004> with clefts.<WH1233>

Shall horses<WH5483> run<WH7323> on the rock?<WH5553> will one plow<WH2790> there with oxen?<WH1241> for you have turned<WH2015> judgment<WH4941> into gall,<WH7219> and the fruit of righteousness<WH6666> into hemlock:<WH3939>
You which rejoice<WH8055> in a thing<WH1697> of nothing,<WH3808> <WH1697> which say,<WH559> Have we not taken<WH3947> to us horns<WH7161> by our own strength?<WH2392>

But, behold,<WH2005> I will raise<WH6965> up against<WH5921> you a nation,<WH1471> O house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> said<WH5002> the LORD<WH3068> the God<WH430> of hosts;<WH6635> and they shall afflict<WH3905> you from the entering<WH935> in of Hemath<WH2574> to the river<WH5158> of the wilderness.<WH6160>
